title: Can't see blocked list
body: I don't know if it was intentional or whether this has been covered before (I just got granted access today) but I can't seem to access the blocked list. I doubt it's super important but I just like to have a reference.

replies.poster: s h i m j i
replies.body:
Hello :)

you'll find your block list located in your **settings, which is located in the top right of the client.** It feels like an awkward place to be put, but then again, I prefer it that the people who I don't enjoy playing with are hidden away and not under a social list.
